ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The evildoers are indeed misguided and insane
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely the sinners are misguided and insane.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The evil-doers are victims of error and madness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The sinful ones will face the destructive torment of hell
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the criminals are astray and insane.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, the criminals are in error and will burn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely the guilty are in error and distress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely the sinners are in error and insanity!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! the guilty are in error and madness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The evil-doers are indeed sunk in error and folly --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the culprits shall be in great error and madness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed the guilty are steeped in error and madness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Truly those in sin are the ones straying in mind, and mad.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, the Mujrimun (polytheists, disbelievers, sinners, criminals, etc.) are in error (in this world) and will burn (in the Hell-fire in the Hereafter).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed the wrongdoers are in error and a raging fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The wicked are in confusion and madness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:47] Indeed the guilty are in error, in the destruction of being killed in this world, and in a blazing fire, a fire that has been set ablaze (musa‘‘ara), that is, fiercely ignited in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! the guilty) the idolaters: Abu Jahl and his host (are in error) in manifest error in the life of the world (and madness) toil and tiredness in hell.
